devdoc.author: rggentil
devdoc.details: My first smartcontract, so probably code could be improved.

params._choice: choose Choice enum value: ROCK, PAPER, SCISSOR
params._isSolo: bool value that represents playing vs House/smartcontract or vs other player

createRound(bool,uint8).return: roundId id number that identify the round created

fundGame().details: It's just the same as fallback function.

getRoundInfo(uint256).details: This function is implemented mainly for debugging purpose. Actually getting info from front-end is managed through events.

params.roundId: round id number that identify a round

getRoundInfo(uint256).return: player1Address address of player1player1Choice choice of player1player2Address address of player2player2Choice choice of player2betAmount amount of the bet of this round, in wei.winner address of the winner, it's 0x0 if not finished or draw

params._choice: choose Choice enum value: ROCK, PAPER, SCISSOR
params._roundId: id number that identify the round to join

setLotteryRate(uint256).details: Mostly for testing porpuse. It should be removed in final deployment

devdoc.title: RPS - RockPaperScissor P2P game, playing also for a jackpot.

createRound(bool,uint8).notice: Function called each time we want to play. Payable function thar receives the bet amount.

fundGame().notice: Payable, to fund game by adding ethers to contract and to the jackpot

getRoundInfo(uint256).notice: Get info from rounds. TODO: This function should be removed in final deployment because it facilitates getting other player's choice before betting.

joinRound(uint256,uint8).notice: Join to an existing round created by other player Payable function thar receives the bet amount.

setLotteryRate(uint256).notice: Set the lottery rate in percentage, how easy is to hit the jackpot

startGame().notice: When we have everything ready owner can start game so anyone can play. Also it starts lottery. Also for restarting game after having stopped it

startLottery().notice: Start lottery (this means playing for jackpot)

stopGame().notice: Function for emergengies. Also it stops lottery.

stopLottery().notice: Stop lottery (this means stop playing for jackpot)

userdoc.notice: This is just a simple game done mostly for learning solidity and web3 development, do not use betting real value since it has some known vulnerabilities.
